messages: 6e7a57903c9564e914874134c18a77c7 (08:28): is there any way to make text display in a vertical column?

7f3bcddef751bfc0cb6ff2c0e1c0fd19 (09:06): http://www.fuelempire.biz/streetteam/ <-- does anyone know why that pic isn't floating right like its supposed to?
d075f53f69051c6fe76713c628b06537 (09:06): is it invalid to have both an id and a class attribute on an element?
7f3bcddef751bfc0cb6ff2c0e1c0fd19 (09:07): in fact you can have multiple classes on an element like this:   id="whatever" class="class1 class2 class3"
8d5b843f8613182cd679d2e5e504d0e3 (09:10): instead of doing <div class="foo"><div class="bar">content</div></div> can I do it in 1 div?
9c10dd7d97bb2d7b9e14408727fdb81a (09:12): [xENo] : reduce #mainPic to {height: 207px;margin: 0;padding: 0; } and then give the img {float: right}
a0e4ec720a249a3e5162548adbcc8f4f (09:22): [xENo]:  to below 'log in' text, right?
9d8f9f96d1a23c98571e0af9510945d0 (09:23): http://www.cssoptimiser.com/ <- any good alternatives for this css optimiser?
7f3bcddef751bfc0cb6ff2c0e1c0fd19 (09:24): it was the height on the login form
7f3bcddef751bfc0cb6ff2c0e1c0fd19 (09:24): it was invisible and extending below the purple box
51d69e7cf9ada63de3bcb18a8e17c1ba (09:25): a good alternative would be a correct link
e91e5e552fdd88ea2cd257e1b39fc44d (09:30): anyway to avoid certain areas of text being selected via CSS
51d69e7cf9ada63de3bcb18a8e17c1ba (09:32): make the text into an image
e91e5e552fdd88ea2cd257e1b39fc44d (09:32): some text is too big to be image
e91e5e552fdd88ea2cd257e1b39fc44d (09:32): got large areas of text i just want to be visible but not selectable
6cc33fc59f5834698e673094ecaae5f8 (09:33): why? You can't stop people from copying your text regardless, if they really want to...
e91e5e552fdd88ea2cd257e1b39fc44d (09:33): not bout that i just don't want it selected
51d69e7cf9ada63de3bcb18a8e17c1ba (09:34): and it's too big for an image?
